General.Name: Guangdong Tecsun Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Tecsun Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. provides information system construction and related operational services. The company provides resident service card, social security card issuance, digital career, intelligent knowledge operation, social security financial, and rural revitalization services. It also offers intelligent terminals, making (issuing) card equipment, read-write devices, and smart office equipment. The company provides services for social security and people's livelihood, employment, life, finance, and other scenarios, as well as governments, banks, and other institutions. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Desheng Technology Co., Ltd. Guangdong Tecsun Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
General.Address: Building F, No. 15, Software Road, Guangzhou, China, 510610
